user_input: Fool Pathway'de Sequence 9 Seer'ın yetenekleri nelerdir?
retrieved_contexts:
["Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 9: Seer

Content:
New Abilities
Enhanced Memory: Initially, those who drink the Seer potion will gain a slight increase in memory that will continuously improve during potion digestion.
This Enhanced Memory grants a Seer the ability to memorize and learn the steps of various Ritualistic Magic and Divination Arts.
Spirituality: A Seer's Spirituality will get enhanced upon drinking this potion.
Spirit Vision: They can use Spirit Vision to see non-physical things, such as ghosts and specters. They could see the different parts of a Soul, deduce a person's health and emotions through it, and determine if something has a magical aura.
They can “see” obstructed objects and “hear” faint footsteps, allowing them to take preemptive judgment. However, their visual, auditory, and tactile senses do not have any enhancements.
Divination Arts & Ritualistic Magic: They can master all kinds of Divination methods, including astrology, spiritual numbers, and scrying as well as become more learned than a Mystery Pryer when it comes to Ritualistic Magic.", "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 9: Seer

Content:

This Enhanced Memory grants a Seer the ability to memorize and learn the steps of various Ritualistic Magic and Divination Arts.
Spirituality: A Seer's Spirituality will get enhanced upon drinking this potion.
Spirit Vision: They can use Spirit Vision to see non-physical things, such as ghosts and specters. They could see the different parts of a Soul, deduce a person's health and emotions through it, and determine if something has a magical aura.
They can “see” obstructed objects and “hear” faint footsteps, allowing them to take preemptive judgment. However, their visual, auditory, and tactile senses do not have any enhancements.

Spirit Vision: They can use Spirit Vision to see non-physical things, such as ghosts and specters. They could see the different parts of a Soul, deduce a person's health and emotions through it, and determine if something has a magical aura.
They can “see” obstructed objects and “hear” faint footsteps, allowing them to take preemptive judgment. However, their visual, auditory, and tactile senses do not have any enhancements.
Divination Arts & Ritualistic Magic: They can master all kinds of Divination methods, including astrology, spiritual numbers, and scrying as well as become more learned than a Mystery Pryer when it comes to Ritualistic Magic.
Seers don't gain knowledge on how to directly utilize these mystical arts, only the ability and talent to do them at an expert level. Their mastery is dependent on their time of learning.
Danger Intuition: They can intuitively detect danger using their Spirituality.", "Pathway: Fool

Seers don't gain knowledge on how to directly utilize these mystical arts, only the ability and talent to do them at an expert level. Their mastery is dependent on their time of learning.
Danger Intuition: They can intuitively detect danger using their Spirituality."]
response:
Fool Pathway'deki Sequence 9: Seer'ın yetenekleri şunlardır:

1. **Gelişmiş Hafıza**: Seer iksirini içenler başlangıçta hafızalarında hafif bir artış yaşarlar ve bu hafıza zamanla iksirin sindirilmesiyle daha da gelişir. Bu gelişmiş hafıza, Seer'a çeşitli Ritüel Büyü ve Kehanet Sanatlarının adımlarını ezberleme ve öğrenme yeteneği kazandırır.

2. **Spiritüalite**: Seer'ın spiritüalitesi iksiri içtikten sonra gelişir.

3. **Ruh Görüşü**: Seer, Ruh Görüşü'nü kullanarak hayaletler ve ruhlar gibi fiziksel olmayan şeyleri görebilir. Bir ruhun farklı parçalarını görebilir, bir kişinin sağlığını ve duygularını çıkarabilir ve bir şeyin büyülü bir auraya sahip olup olmadığını belirleyebilir. Gizlenmiş nesneleri "görebilir" ve hafif ayak seslerini "duyabilir", böylece önceden yargıda bulunabilir. Ancak, görsel, işitsel ve dokunsal duyuları herhangi bir gelişme göstermez.

4. **Kehanet Sanatları ve Ritüel Büyü**: Seer, astroloji, ruhsal sayılar ve kristal küre gibi çeşitli Kehanet yöntemlerinde ustalaşabilir ve Ritüel Büyü konusunda bir Gizem Araştırmacısı'ndan daha bilgili hale gelebilir. Ancak, bu mistik sanatları doğrudan kullanma bilgisine sahip olmazlar; sadece bu sanatlarda uzmanlık seviyesinde yetenek ve kabiliyet kazanırlar. Ustalıkları, öğrenme sürelerine bağlıdır.

5. **Tehlike Sezgisi**: Seer, spiritüalitesini kullanarak tehlikeyi sezgisel olarak algılayabilir.
reference: Seer potionunu içenler hafıza artışı, Spirituality gelişimi, Spirit Vision (ruhani görüş), Divination Arts & Ritualistic Magic yetenekleri ve Danger Intuition (tehlike sezgisi) kazanır.

user_input: Sequence 8 Clown hangi fiziksel yeteneklere sahiptir?
retrieved_contexts:
['Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 8: Clown

Content:
Physical Enhancement: After advancing into a Clown, they will possess a strong control over their body, making them akin to a master acrobat and circus performer.
A Clown has near complete control over their bodily functions and facial expressions.
Their face will only show the expressions they wish to show, with the only situations such as extreme shock or pain causing them to show their true feelings, making them the nemesis of Spectators. This also applies to their limbs and other body parts.
They can also project their current appearance by calming their mind.
Their dexterity and speed become exceptional, while their strength gains a decent increase.
These enhancements allow a Clown to commit various feats of acrobatics, such as swinging themselves up by their feet, easily scaling the outsides of buildings or using backflips to very steadily escape from attacks during fights.
They gain powerful coordination and a near inhumane sense of balance. A Clown will never lose their balance, barring certain extreme circumstances.', 'Pathway: Fool

Content:

A Clown has near complete control over their bodily functions and facial expressions.

They gain powerful coordination and a near inhumane sense of balance. A Clown will never lose their balance, barring certain extreme circumstances.', 'Pathway: Fool

A Clown has near complete control over their bodily functions and facial expressions.
Their face will only show the expressions they wish to show, with the only situations such as extreme shock or pain causing them to show their true feelings, making them the nemesis of Spectators. This also applies to their limbs and other body parts.
They can also project their current appearance by calming their mind.
Their dexterity and speed become exceptional, while their strength gains a decent increase.
These enhancements allow a Clown to commit various feats of acrobatics, such as swinging themselves up by their feet, easily scaling the outsides of buildings or using backflips to very steadily escape from attacks during fights.
They gain powerful coordination and a near inhumane sense of balance. A Clown will never lose their balance, barring certain extreme circumstances.
Their enhanced coordination allows them to walk over tightropes as if they were flat ground, jump and land on the backrest of a chair without stumbling, while also making them talented with various combat techniques.
Paper Daggers: A Clown becomes capable of temporarily turning sheets of paper as hard and sharp as steel, allowing them to throw them as flying daggers or use them as knives.', 'Pathway: Fool

These Paper Daggers that a Clown makes are powerful enough to stick to solid stone and pierce through a Hunter's flesh and bone.", "Pathway: Fool

These Paper Daggers that a Clown makes are powerful enough to stick to solid stone and pierce through a Hunter's flesh and bone."]
response:
Sequence 8 Clown, gelişmiş fiziksel yeteneklere sahiptir. Bir Clown, vücut kontrolünü mükemmel bir şekilde sağlar ve bu da onları usta bir akrobat ve sirk sanatçısına benzetir. Vücut fonksiyonları ve yüz ifadeleri üzerinde neredeyse tam bir kontrol sahibidirler. Yüzleri, sadece istedikleri ifadeleri gösterir; aşırı şok veya acı gibi durumlar dışında gerçek duygularını yansıtmazlar.

Clown'un çevikliği ve hızı olağanüstü seviyelere ulaşır, güçleri ise makul bir artış gösterir. Bu yetenekler, Clown'un ayaklarıyla kendini sallaması, binaların dışına kolayca tırmanması veya dövüşler sırasında geriye taklalar atarak saldırılardan kaçınması gibi akrobatik becerileri gerçekleştirmesine olanak tanır. Güçlü bir koordinasyon ve neredeyse insanüstü bir denge duygusuna sahip olurlar. Sıkı iplerin üzerinde yürüyebilir, bir sandalyenin arkalığına zıplayıp düşmeden inebilirler ve çeşitli dövüş tekniklerinde yeteneklidirler.

Ayrıca, Clown kağıtları geçici olarak çelik kadar sert ve keskin hale getirerek, onları uçan hançerler gibi fırlatabilir veya bıçak olarak kullanabilir. Bu kağıt hançerler, katı taşa saplanacak kadar güçlüdür ve bir Avcı'nın etini ve kemiğini delebilir.
reference: Clown, vücutları üzerinde güçlü kontrol, akrobatik yetenek, mükemmel denge, el becerisi ve hız artışı kazanır. Ayrıca Paper Daggers (kağıt hançerler) oluşturabilir.

user_input: Marionettist'in Spirit Body Threads Manipulation yeteneği nasıl çalışır?
retrieved_contexts:
["Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 5: Marionettist

Content:
New Abilities
Spirit Body Threads Manipulation: This is the core power of a Marionettist. With it, they are able to perceive and manipulate Spirit Body Threads, from up to 100 meters away.
Through manipulating the Spirit Body Threads of an organism, they directly influence the target’s Soul Body, Astral Projection, Body of Heart and Mind, and Ether Body. Then, using the Ether Body as a bridge, they can control their target’s body.
Within the same Sequence level, targets who have been turned into Marionettes are unable to utilize their Resurrection methods to Revive and escape being a Marionette.
Through the changes within the Spirit Body Threads of an individual target, a Marionettist will have the capability to be able to detect the Parasitism caused by a Parasite.
By tracing the Spirit Body Threads of a target, a Marionettist can perceive Invisible targets, such as a Shadow Ascetic's Shadow Lurking or a Witch's Invisibility.", "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 5: Marionettist

Content:
New Abilities
Spirit Body Threads Manipulation: This is the core power of a Marionettist. With it, they are able to perceive and manipulate Spirit Body Threads, from up to 100 meters away.
Through manipulating the Spirit Body Threads of an organism, they directly influence the target’s Soul Body, Astral Projection, Body of Heart and Mind, and Ether Body. Then, using the Ether Body as a bridge, they can control their target’s body.
Within the same Sequence level, targets who have been turned into Marionettes are unable to utilize their Resurrection methods to Revive and escape being a Marionette.
Through the changes within the Spirit Body Threads of an individual target, a Marionettist will have the capability to be able to detect the Parasitism caused by a Parasite.
By tracing the Spirit Body Threads of a target, a Marionettist can perceive Invisible targets, such as a Shadow Ascetic's Shadow Lurking or a Witch's Invisibility.", "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 5: Marionettist

Content:
New Abilities
Spirit Body Threads Manipulation: This is the core power of a Marionettist. With it, they are able to perceive and manipulate Spirit Body Threads, from up to 100 meters away.
Through manipulating the Spirit Body Threads of an organism, they directly influence the target’s Soul Body, Astral Projection, Body of Heart and Mind, and Ether Body. Then, using the Ether Body as a bridge, they can control their target’s body.
Within the same Sequence level, targets who have been turned into Marionettes are unable to utilize their Resurrection methods to Revive and escape being a Marionette.
Through the changes within the Spirit Body Threads of an individual target, a Marionettist will have the capability to be able to detect the Parasitism caused by a Parasite.
By tracing the Spirit Body Threads of a target, a Marionettist can perceive Invisible targets, such as a Shadow Ascetic's Shadow Lurking or a Witch's Invisibility.
The process of Spirit Body Threads Manipulation can be hard to detect, and only Beyonders with Divination or Prophetic abilities are able to detect it happening.
The process of controlling a target's Spirit Body Threads has a limited range of 5-10 meters (depending on potion digestion) and is split into 2 separate phases.
The initial phase of control takes between 5 and 20 seconds to achieve, depending on the rate of potion digestion and the potency of their target's Spirit Body.", "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 5: Marionettist

Content:
New Abilities
Spirit Body Threads Manipulation: This is the core power of a Marionettist. With it, they are able to perceive and manipulate Spirit Body Threads, from up to 100 meters away.
Through manipulating the Spirit Body Threads of an organism, they directly influence the target’s Soul Body, Astral Projection, Body of Heart and Mind, and Ether Body. Then, using the Ether Body as a bridge, they can control their target’s body.
Within the same Sequence level, targets who have been turned into Marionettes are unable to utilize their Resurrection methods to Revive and escape being a Marionette.
Through the changes within the Spirit Body Threads of an individual target, a Marionettist will have the capability to be able to detect the Parasitism caused by a Parasite.
By tracing the Spirit Body Threads of a target, a Marionettist can perceive Invisible targets, such as a Shadow Ascetic's Shadow Lurking or a Witch's Invisibility.
The process of Spirit Body Threads Manipulation can be hard to detect, and only Beyonders with Divination or Prophetic abilities are able to detect it happening.
The process of controlling a target's Spirit Body Threads has a limited range of 5-10 meters (depending on potion digestion) and is split into 2 separate phases.
The initial phase of control takes between 5 and 20 seconds to achieve, depending on the rate of potion digestion and the potency of their target's Spirit Body.", "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 5: Marionettist

Content:
By tracing the Spirit Body Threads of a target, a Marionettist can perceive Invisible targets, such as a Shadow Ascetic's Shadow Lurking or a Witch's Invisibility.
The process of Spirit Body Threads Manipulation can be hard to detect, and only Beyonders with Divination or Prophetic abilities are able to detect it happening.
The process of controlling a target's Spirit Body Threads has a limited range of 5-10 meters (depending on potion digestion) and is split into 2 separate phases.
The initial phase of control takes between 5 and 20 seconds to achieve, depending on the rate of potion digestion and the potency of their target's Spirit Body.
The target's movements and thoughts begin to slow considerably and are often the first sign that they are being controlled. They can still attempt to fight back and can still think and move, but at reduced speed and greater difficulty; this will only increase as the Marionettist deepens the control of their Spirit Body Threads.
This process can be interrupted by external stimuli, usually sharp and abrupt pain, both physical and mental. Upon the process being interrupted, the target immediately regains full faculty over both thoughts and physical movement and the Marionettist would have to start the process over from the beginning.
The final phase occurs if the first step is not interrupted for around 5 to 2 and a half minutes, which will lead to full transformation of a target into a Marionette.", "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 5: Marionettist

Content:
New Abilities
Spirit Body Threads Manipulation: This is the core power of a Marionettist. With it, they are able to perceive and manipulate Spirit Body Threads, from up to 100 meters away.
Through manipulating the Spirit Body Threads of an organism, they directly influence the target’s Soul Body, Astral Projection, Body of Heart and Mind, and Ether Body. Then, using the Ether Body as a bridge, they can control their target’s body.
Within the same Sequence level, targets who have been turned into Marionettes are unable to utilize their Resurrection methods to Revive and escape being a Marionette.
This includes, but might not be limited to, the Resurrection abilities of the Undying, the Unaging, the Bloody Archduke, the Knight of Misfortune, and the Black Emperor.
The Marionette can Resurrect using their original Pathway's abilities; however, they will remain a Marionette.
If the Marionette state is lifted and the Marionette dies, the original owner will still not be able to Resurrect.
Instead, they will remain a Marionette and continue dying until their Resurrection is fully depleted.
Through the changes within the Spirit Body Threads of an individual target, a Marionettist will have the capability to be able to detect the Parasitism caused by a Parasite.
By tracing the Spirit Body Threads of a target, a Marionettist can perceive Invisible targets, such as a Shadow Ascetic's Shadow Lurking or a Witch's Invisibility."]
response:
Marionettist'in "Spirit Body Threads Manipulation" yeteneği, bir Marionettist'in temel gücüdür. Bu yetenek sayesinde, Marionettist 100 metreye kadar mesafeden Spirit Body Threads (Ruh Beden İplikleri) algılayabilir ve manipüle edebilir. Bu iplikler aracılığıyla, bir organizmanın Ruh Bedenini, Astral Projeksiyonunu, Kalp ve Zihin Bedenini ve Eter Bedenini doğrudan etkileyebilir. Eter Bedenini bir köprü olarak kullanarak, hedefin bedenini kontrol edebilirler.

Aynı Sıra düzeyinde, Marionet haline getirilmiş hedefler, Marionet olmaktan kaçmak için Diriliş yöntemlerini kullanamazlar. Marionettist, bir hedefin Spirit Body Threads'ini izleyerek, bir Parazit tarafından neden olunan Parazitizmi tespit edebilir. Ayrıca, bir hedefin Spirit Body Threads'ini izleyerek, Shadow Ascetic'in Gölge Saklanması veya Cadı'nın Görünmezliği gibi Görünmez hedefleri algılayabilir.

Spirit Body Threads Manipulation süreci, algılanması zor olabilir ve yalnızca Kehanet veya Kehanet yeteneklerine sahip Beyonder'lar bu durumu fark edebilir. Hedefin Spirit Body Threads'ini kontrol etme süreci 5-10 metre ile sınırlıdır ve iki ayrı aşamaya ayrılır. Kontrolün başlangıç aşaması, iksir sindirimi oranına ve hedefin Ruh Bedeninin gücüne bağlı olarak 5 ila 20 saniye sürer. Hedefin hareketleri ve düşünceleri önemli ölçüde yavaşlamaya başlar ve bu genellikle kontrol altında olduklarının ilk belirtisidir. Bu süreç, keskin ve ani bir fiziksel veya zihinsel acı gibi dış uyaranlarla kesilebilir. Kesildiğinde, hedef hemen düşünce ve fiziksel hareket üzerinde tam yetki kazanır ve Marionettist süreci baştan başlatmak zorunda kalır. İlk adım 5 ila 2,5 dakika boyunca kesintiye uğramazsa, hedefin tam anlamıyla bir Marionet haline dönüşmesiyle sonuçlanan son aşama gerçekleşir.
reference: Marionettist, 100 metreye kadar Spirit Body Threads'i algılayıp manipüle edebilir. Hedefin Soul Body, Astral Projection, Body of Heart and Mind ve Ether Body'sini etkileyerek kontrol sağlar.

retrieved_contexts:
['Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 4: Bizarro Sorcerer

Content:
New Abilities
Bestowal: Bizarro Sorcerers can "gift" their Worms of Spirit to their Marionettes allowing those "gifted" to use the Bizarro Sorcerers' Beyonder powers.
Initially, Bizarro Sorcerers are only only split 50 Worms of Spirit from their Mythical Creature Form. This will increase with digestion of their potion.
If they go beyond their limit, they will suffer from symptoms of schizophrenia that cannot be treated. This will increase their tendency of losing control.
They can retrieve, "gift" and switch Worms of Spirit to any Marionette within a range of 1 kilometer through their Spirit Body Threads.
If the Worms of Spirit's connection to the Bizzaro Sorcerer is cut, the Marionette that has been disconnected will die shortly after.
Bizarro Sorcerers must implant at least a single maggot in a Marionette if they want it to use their Beyonder abilities.
Being technically dead, Marionettes through Shapeshifting can be molded into shapes impossible for a living creature to assume (such as a 2 finger width human figure).', 'Pathway: Fool

Initially, Bizarro Sorcerers are only only split 50 Worms of Spirit from their Mythical Creature Form. This will increase with digestion of their potion.
If they go beyond their limit, they will suffer from symptoms of schizophrenia that cannot be treated. This will increase their tendency of losing control.
They can retrieve, "gift" and switch Worms of Spirit to any Marionette within a range of 1 kilometer through their Spirit Body Threads.
If the Worms of Spirit's connection to the Bizzaro Sorcerer is cut, the Marionette that has been disconnected will die shortly after.
Bizarro Sorcerers must implant at least a single maggot in a Marionette if they want it to use their Beyonder abilities.
Being technically dead, Marionettes through Shapeshifting can be molded into shapes impossible for a living creature to assume (such as a 2 finger width human figure).
Through this, they can increase the range of their ability to make new Marionettes by 1150 meters (1000 meters as the initial range for controlling a Marionette, plus 150 meters as the initial range for taking control of a new one) by using their already converted Marionettes to take control of new Marionettes.', 'Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 4: Bizarro Sorcerer

Content:
New Abilities
Bestowal: Bizarro Sorcerers can "gift" their Worms of Spirit to their Marionettes allowing those "gifted" to use the Bizarro Sorcerers' Beyonder powers.
Initially, Bizarro Sorcerers are only only split 50 Worms of Spirit from their Mythical Creature Form. This will increase with digestion of their potion.
If they go beyond their limit, they will suffer from symptoms of schizophrenia that cannot be treated. This will increase their tendency of losing control.
They can retrieve, "gift" and switch Worms of Spirit to any Marionette within a range of 1 kilometer through their Spirit Body Threads.
If the Worms of Spirit's connection to the Bizzaro Sorcerer is cut, the Marionette that has been disconnected will die shortly after.
Bizarro Sorcerers must implant at least a single maggot in a Marionette if they want it to use their Beyonder abilities.
Being technically dead, Marionettes through Shapeshifting can be molded into shapes impossible for a living creature to assume (such as a 2 finger width human figure).
Through this, they can increase the range of their ability to make new Marionettes by 1150 meters (1000 meters as the initial range for controlling a Marionette, plus 150 meters as the initial range for taking control of a new one) by using their already converted Marionettes to take control of new Marionettes.', "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 4: Bizarro Sorcerer

Content:
Strengthened Abilities
Their previous abilities as a Beyonder have been massively enhanced.
Their abilities as a Magician have been massively improved.
Damage Transfer: Their wounds or that of others can be Transferred onto a paper figurine.
Air Cannon: The upgraded form of Air Bullet whose might has increased to that of a cannon.
Flaming Jump: The range for them to phase using flames has increased to 1 kilometer.
Illusion Creation: Their illusion abilities have experienced a qualitative upgrade.
Their auditory illusions that are nearly as loud as a Cataclysmic Interrer's roar.
They are able to hide an entire cruise liner as well as create illusory thoughts.
Shapeshifting: They can transform into any animals that aren't too disparate in size.
When they are in a Spirit Body state, this restriction is removed.
Spirit Body Threads Manipulation: Their ability to control the Spirit Body Threads of others have been massively strengthened and enhanced.
The initial control of someone's Spirit Body Threads can be achieved by a Bizzaro Sorcerer in just 3 seconds while full control is achieved within 15 seconds.
The initial range for them being able to control Spirit Body Threads has increased to 150 meters. This range will increase as they digest the potion.
Marionette: The amount, effect, and corresponding alterations Bizzaro Sorcerers can do with their Marionettes have increased tremendously."]
response: Bizarro Sorcerer'ın "Bestowal" yeteneği, onların "Worms of Spirit" adlı ruh solucanlarını Marionettelerine "hediye" edebilmesini sağlar. Bu sayede, Marionetteler Bizarro Sorcerer'ın Beyonder güçlerini kullanabilirler. Başlangıçta, Bizarro Sorcerer'lar, Mitolojik Yaratık Formlarından yalnızca 50 ruh solucanı ayırabilirler ve bu miktar, iksirlerini sindirdikçe artar. Eğer bu limitin ötesine geçerlerse, tedavi edilemeyen şizofreni belirtileri yaşayabilirler ve kontrol kaybı eğilimleri artar. Bizarro Sorcerer'lar, 1 kilometre mesafe içinde ruh solucanlarını Marionettelerine aktarıp geri alabilir veya değiştirebilirler. Eğer ruh solucanlarının bağlantısı kesilirse, bağlantısı kesilen Marionette kısa süre sonra ölür. Ayrıca, Marionettelerin Beyonder yeteneklerini kullanabilmesi için en az bir solucanın yerleştirilmesi gereklidir.
reference: Bizarro Sorcerer, Worms of Spirit'lerini Marionette'lerine 'hediye' edebilir, bu sayede Marionette'ler Beyonder güçlerini kullanabilir. Başlangıçta 50 Worms of Spirit ayırabilirler.

user_input: Scholar of Yore Historical Void'i nasıl kullanır?
retrieved_contexts:
['Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 3: Scholar of Yore

Content:
The prerequisite of Summoning and Borrowing from the past while in the Historical Void is that there is a past of themselves within the gap of history they are in.
Klein could not Borrow power from his past self because he was Hiding inside a gap corresponding to a period of history where Giant King Aurmir buried "His" parents.
While Hiding in the Historical Void, a Scholar of Yore is able to send their consciousness back to their Historical Projection and control it by themselves.
The gaps that they can Hide inside within the Historical Void are limited to the Scholar of Yore's understanding of the corresponding history.
Klein Hid inside the Historical Void corresponding to a period of history where Giant King Aurmir buried "His" parents. This prevented Zaratul from following him there even though the former was an Attendant of Mysteries.
Scholar of Yores gain the ability to produce fog and reduce the temperature of an area.', 'Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 3: Scholar of Yore

Content:

The gaps that they can Hide inside within the Historical Void are limited to the Scholar of Yore's understanding of the corresponding history.
Klein Hid inside the Historical Void corresponding to a period of history where Giant King Aurmir buried "His" parents. This prevented Zaratul from following him there even though the former was an Attendant of Mysteries.
Scholar of Yores gain the ability to produce fog and reduce the temperature of an area.', 'Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 3: Scholar of Yore

Content:
If the duration of a Historical Projection ends, it will dissipate. As such, for Pathways with authority over the flow of Time, they can hasten its end.
Historical Void Hiding: They can enter the Historical Void and Hide within its gaps, so long as their Spirituality allows. This allows a Scholar of Yore to avoid danger, but they must come out the exact spot in the world once the Scholar of Yore stops hiding.

Klein Hid inside the Historical Void corresponding to a period of history where Giant King Aurmir buried "His" parents. This prevented Zaratul from following him there even though the former was an Attendant of Mysteries.
Scholar of Yores gain the ability to produce fog and reduce the temperature of an area.', "Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 3: Scholar of Yore

Content:
If the target's true body hides in the Historical Void or enters a Concealed state, they can send their mind to their Historical Projection and control it.
Existences who have died but still have a Soul remaining (or have residual will) can sense when their Historical Projection have been Summoned.
A Scholar Of Yore is connected to their Summoned Historical Projection(s) and can utilize this connection to communicate their intent and orders directly without speaking.
This relies on the Scholar of Yore's Historical Projection's lack of intelligence and/or having a good relationship with it as a means of control.
This allows for a Scholar of Yore to quickly coordinate with an ally who is controlling their summoned Historical Projection.
They cannot Summon things directly related to a Uniqueness which includes Uniqueness as objects and those who have accommodated it within them.
However, there are ways to bypass this restriction to some extent, they can instead Summon objects/people which a Uniqueness can exert power on."]
response: "Scholar of Yore" unvanına sahip bir kişi, Historical Void'u kullanarak belirli tarihsel boşluklarda saklanabilir. Bu saklanma, kişinin ruhsallığının izin verdiği sürece yapılabilir. Historical Void'da saklanırken, Scholar of Yore, kendi tarihsel projeksiyonuna bilincini gönderip onu kontrol edebilir. Ancak, saklanılan tarihsel boşluklar, Scholar of Yore'un o döneme dair anlayışı ile sınırlıdır. Klein, dev kral Aurmir'in ebeveynlerini gömdüğü tarihsel döneme ait bir boşlukta saklanarak, geçmişteki kendisinden güç ödünç alamamıştır. Scholar of Yore, bu saklanma yöntemi sayesinde tehlikelerden kaçınabilir, ancak saklanmayı bıraktığında dünyadaki tam olarak aynı noktada ortaya çıkmalıdır. Ayrıca, Scholar of Yore, sis üretebilir ve bir alanın sıcaklığını düşürebilir.
reference: Scholar of Yore, Historical Void Borrowing (geçmiş benliğinden güç ödünç alma), Historical Projection Summoning (geçmişten projeksiyon çağırma) ve Historical Void Hiding (Historical Void'de saklanma) yeteneklerine sahiptir.

retrieved_contexts:
['Pathway: Fool
Title: Sequence 2: Miracle Invoker

Content:
Authorities
Miracles: "They" are able to perform Miracles for others and "Themselves", thus being able to achieve a myriad of effects with varying potency, which scales based on the similar accumulated Wishes that "They" have granted to others beforehand.
Its effects don't only come from the Beyonder Characteristics but also from similar Wishes of different creatures with Spirituality that may be related to the Sea of Collective Subconscious.
To put it simply, Miracle Invokers need to seek out and satisfy all kinds of Wishes before "They" could fulfill "Their" own Wishes, turning the corresponding situation into a reality.
As for how "They" could fulfill others' Wishes, "They" have 2 known methods.
"They" could use other Beyonder powers that "They" or the Sealed Artifacts that "They" wield possess to achieve the corresponding effects. 
Klein fulfilled other people's Wishes to know about the answers to their corresponding questions by using Arrodes.
Klein utilized Life's Cane fulfill Jasmine's Wish of restoring her appearance before she was burned in an accident.', 'Pathway: Fool

"They" could also just directly grant a Wish with "Their" previous accumulated power of Wishes in order to create a true Miracle. 
Klein rebuilt various houses and buildings, and eventually Constant City to its former, non-war-torn state via a Wish.
Klein removed all the deformations and disfigurements of the body in all the citizens of Moon City via a Wish.', 'Pathway: Fool

Title: Sequence 2: Miracle Invoker

Content:
Beyonder Characteristics:

There are a total of nine Miracle Invoker Beyonder Characteristics in existence. A maximum of six Miracle Invokers are allowed to exist at once if there are three Attendants of Mysteries already due to the limited amount of Beyonder Characteristics.Further information: Fool Pathway/Misc']
response:
Miracle Invoker, başkaları ve kendileri için mucizeler gerçekleştirebilir. Bu mucizelerin etkileri, daha önce başkalarına verilen benzer dileklerin birikimine dayanarak değişkenlik gösterir. Mucize Invoker'lar, kendi dileklerini gerçekleştirmeden önce her türlü dileği arayıp tatmin etmelidir. Başkalarının dileklerini gerçekleştirmek için bilinen iki yöntemleri vardır:

1. Kendi sahip oldukları veya kullandıkları Mühürlü Eserlerin diğer Beyonder güçlerini kullanarak istenen etkileri elde edebilirler. Örneğin, Klein, Arrodes'i kullanarak insanların sorularının cevabını bilme dileklerini yerine getirmiştir. Ayrıca, Life's Cane'i kullanarak Jasmine'in bir kazada yanmadan önceki görünümünü geri kazanma dileğini gerçekleştirmiştir.

2. Birikmiş dilek güçlerini kullanarak doğrudan bir dileği yerine getirip gerçek bir mucize yaratabilirler. Örneğin, Klein, bir dilek aracılığıyla Constant City'yi eski, savaş öncesi durumuna geri getirmiş ve Moon City'deki tüm vatandaşların vücutlarındaki deformasyonları ve şekil bozukluklarını ortadan kaldırmıştır.
reference: Miracle Invoker, önce başkalarının dileklerini yerine getirerek güç biriktirir, ardından kendi dilekleri için bu birikimi kullanarak mucize yaratır. Dilekler bozulmaya açıktır ve büyük dilekler daha fazla bozulur.
